attributes.action: Stop the petition banning schools hatching eggs.
attributes.background: These petitions just ignore all common scence. The main reason they have for banning it is that male chicks are disposed of. Well what do you think happens to thousands of meat birds every year? Cbildren need to learn the whole proccess inreal life. NOT AT A COMPUTER!!

rejection.details:
We can only remove petitions that don't comply with the petitions standards.

You could start a new petition calling for a specific change to the rules for petitions. You can find out about the rules here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/help
